description: This table contains a weekly history of active product devices and trips for external organizations

schema.name: week
schema.description: The starting 'date' of the week in 'YYYY-mm-dd' format

schema.name: product_id
schema.description: The internal ID of the Samsara product

schema.name: total_devices_heartbeats
schema.description: The total number of product devices that had an active heartbeat in the calendar week

schema.name: total_devices_trips
schema.description: The total number of product devices with at least one trip on in the calendar week
